comments:
Description:
Fail to preview attached xtab in web viewer
Build number:2.2.1.v200707241305

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report in bug #190997.
2. Add required jtds driver jar.
3. Preview in Web Viewer.

Expected result:
Display xtab data.

Actual result:
Display error message without data. But preview is ok in html.

Error log:
ReportDesign (id = 1):
- /olap/cube_Customer Cube doesnt exist
